home.title: Javier Salgado — Full Stack Developer

home.description1: Passionate about creating innovative technological solutions and exceptional digital experiences. Specialized in backend development with .NET and modern frontend with Angular.

home.about_p3: I'm always exploring new technologies and best practices, maintaining a balance between innovation and stability in my projects.
